textBox.richText: I am seeking qualified candidates for one postdoctoral 1-year research position in computer vision and machine learning for anti-spoofing in face recognition. The research will be conducted in the context of a new project funded by the Swiss Innovation Promotion Agency (CTI). The overall goal of the project is to develop new algorithms and models for anti-spoofing in face recognition. Apply online .
Join the team: new Post-Doc position !
